Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Jeff Bagwell
Dear Sir,
Jeff Bagwell has nothing more to prove at A El Paso Diablos!
He has an AVG of .373 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of John Wehner
Dear Sir,
John Wehner shouldn't play at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .181 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Braulio Castillo
Dear Sir,
Braulio Castillo isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .242, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of Ruben Amaro
Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .186, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Tim Flannery

Date: Thursday, 6/1/1990
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Pete Incaviglia

Mike Mason
